ygData.subject: Re: Spells, This Forum,Etc.
ygData.msgSnippet: Please give me the new address.. heh Sizkrath ... From: Ken Morris  To: eq_wizards@onelist.com  Date:
ygData.messageBody:
Please give me the new address.. heh

Sizkrath


-----Original Message-----
From: Ken Morris <kmorris2@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 5:00 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Spells, This Forum,Etc.


>From: "Ken Morris" <kmorris2@...>
>
>You are very perceptive Valacian and, at least to me, make a lot of sense.
>I have stated before, several times, that I am very happy with the wizard
>class as it stands. Some ppl don't agree. Very well, as Valacian
suggested,
>lets get by this and focus on what we CAN do. Lets unlock the mysteries of
>the wizard class as it stands now, not what it could be or what it should
>be. That's what the /feedback feature is for in the game.
>
>If we wish to continue to argue the different aspects of the wizard class,
>then maybe we should make a new email list for that specific focus. Don't
>get me wrong, I like a good debate as much as the next person, but I think
>Valacian is right, we have the potential of scaring ppl away, of doing the
>opposite of what this list was created for.
>
>Thanks Valacian for the reality check.
>
>Talarin Kal'Amon, High Elven Wizard
>
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Valacian <abryson@...>
>To: 'EQ Wizards' <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
>Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 6:21 PM
>Subject: [eq_wizards] Spells, This Forum,Etc.
>
>
>> From: Valacian <abryson@...>
>>
>> I can feel the wrath now... but I am ready for the comments.
>>
>> If I may comment - I don't believe that us discussing what 'would be
nice'
>for Wizard spells really helps us be Wizards. I really believe that if we
>continue to complain or comment on the apparent lack of spells/problems
with
>spells that we have, we are not going to achieve what I believe this
mailing
>list was setup for. This list is to share information between all Wizards
>within Norrath ! We are going to lose potential and current subscribers
(me
>and I'm sure others), thus losing valuable shared information because of
our
>ranting and raving about our class. Remember, Verant is probably not
>reading this forum..
>>
>> My suggestion: Let's talk about ideas and share information that will
>help each other play the class that we chose to play.
>>
>> So far, the most useful thing I have read (besides Spoiler information)
is
>the 'bug' that allows our Eye of Zoom to unlock doors. I think that's
great
>!!
>>
>> Valacian - 24th Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony
>>
>>
>> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
>> Looking to expand your world?

>>
